name: udel_air_temp_v501_mean
title: Air Temperature (Yearly Average)
description: Average monthly air temperature per year. Created using UDel Air Temperature dataset (v5.01)

extract_types_info.max: maximum air temperature per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.mean: average air temperature per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum air temperature per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Willmott, C. J. and K. Matsuura (2001) Terrestrial Air Temperature and Precipitation: Monthly and Annual Time Series (1950 - 1999), http://climate.geog.udel.edu/~climate/html_pages/README.ghcn_ts2.html.
